code:
```verilog
module TopModule (
    input logic clk,             // Clock signal, positive edge triggered
    input logic reset,           // Synchronous active high reset
    input logic [7:0] d,         // 8-bit data input
    output logic [7:0] q         // 8-bit data output
);

    always_ff @(posedge clk) begin
        if (reset) begin
            q <= 8'b00000000;
        end else begin
            q <= d;
        end
    end

endmodule
```
